Html:
Q1:  Does the cast sequencer take the TPS limit into account?

Q2:  Does rawr.mage rely on the cast sequence to determine DPS?

A1: Only indirectly, in that overall tps will be below the limit, but it doesn't guarantee that tps at the start for example will be below the limit.

A2: Sequence reconstruction is a post-computation based on best spell cycles, it does not influence the dps used in comparisons.
